trans-unit.source: You extend your [Absorb Kinetic Energy]{1} ability to up to thirty creatures within short range so that they also can absorb energy from physical attacks and impacts for one hour. If you have [Absorb Pure Energy]{2} or [Improved Absorb Kinetic Energy]{3}, these creatures can use those abilities as well. The creatures, however, cannot release excess energy as a blast.
trans-unit.target: You extend your [Absorb Kinetic Energy]{1} ability to up to thirty creatures within short range so that they also can absorb energy from physical attacks and impacts for one hour.
